A

authenticate(String, String, char[], PasswordValidator) - Method in class org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.loginmodules.password.authenticators.jdbc.JdbcPasswordAuthenticator
Authenticate a user by validating the user's password, returning a Subject with one or more Principals set (if validation was successful), or throw a LoginException (if validation fails)

org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.loginmodules.password.authenticators.jdbc - package org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.loginmodules.password.authenticators.jdbc
